mapper.insert: insert into ums_growth_change_history (id, member_id, create_time, change_type, change_count, operate_man, operate_note, source_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ums_growth_change_history set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change_count = #{changeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_man = #{operateMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_note = #{operateNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, member_id, create_time, change_type, change_count, operate_man, operate_note, source_type from ums_growth_change_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, member_id, create_time, change_type, change_count, operate_man, operate_note, source_type from ums_growth_change_history
